m_szDocTitle: Gore Joins Industry in Celebrating National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day - Oil & Gas 360
m_szDocSumamry: Gore Joins Industry in Celebrating National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day  October 8, 2015 - 5:00 AM EDT close yes               Gore Joins Industry in Celebrating National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day ELKTON, Md., Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, W.L. Gore & Associates (Gore) joins the nation in celebrating National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day to raise awareness of fuel cell and hydrogen technologies that provide reliable and resilient power, reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and increase America's energy security. The 8th of October was chosen to observe National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day in re
